text: "Undercover of the Night" is a 1983 song by English rock band The Rolling Stones and is the leading single from their 1983 album Undercover. It went to number 4 in the Netherlands, number 5 in Belgium, number 8 in Norway, number 9 in the United States, number 10 in New Zealand and Ireland, number 11 in Canada and the United Kingdom, number 15 in Sweden, number 18 in Switzerland and number 19 in Austria and Finland. Category:1983 songs Category:The Rolling Stones songs
title: Undercover of the Night
